title: Update dependencies
body_html:
After having certain moments of enlightment with updating dependencies in other apps, I had a look at the Teams App's dependencies.

Rails 5.1 is around the corner and certain deprecated things the Teams App is using / doing won't be possible anymore 😉 - such as, e.g

  • non-kwargs syntax for controller specs
  • have stubs access the DB

Also: providing the valid_session with Devise-related specs is no longer recommended since Rails 4 - there's no benefit in doing it now IIRC.

Still, this is WIP, I just pushed it in order to be able to continue on it from other machines and be reminded that it's still open 😉
